name: Platforman
description:
In this game your goal is to find the key and reach the next level, of which there are 3 (not including the tutorial). You can also collect 'coins' in order to increase your score. I call them coins, but I dont really know what they are. 

BUG WARNING:

DO NOT STAND UP IN A CRAWLING SPACE

RESETING A LEVEL WITH P DOES NOT RESET YOUR HEALTH DESPITE RESETING THE HEALTH ICONS SO ITS BETTER TO JUST DIE INSTEAD. 

This is my first actual game that is not just me making a project, trying to code some random mechanics which kinda work together and calling it a game lol
